name: Press Space To Jump The Gap
name_original: Press Space To Jump The Gap
description:
A simple platform game clone. What could go wrong?

Press SPACE to JUMP THE GAP

Press LEFT and RIGHT to MOVE

If for whatever reason that doesn't work, then SCROLL to ZOOM, and CLICK/DRAG THE MOUSE around to fix the problem

Then go ahead and JUMP THE GAP!

HINT: Zoom in on the red words

Source Code: https://github.com/foolmoron/JumpTheGap

Also play on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/790820
